description: Ms. codex. Title supplied by cataloger. Manuscript erroneously foliated beginning on the second leaf. Record follows erroneous foliation. Physical description: 31 lines per page; written in small naskh in black on glazed, laid Arabic paper. Illuminated ʻunwān in gold and color on leaf 1(bis)b; text framed in gold with marginal red border. Rubrication and catchwords. Occasional staining and a few repairs. Most leaves are detached. Origin: First part completed 1[0]94 H [1683], by Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ibn Sayf al-Jamrī (leaf 128b). Second part completed 14 Ṣafar 1095 H [1 February 1684], by the same scribe (leaf 463b).
author: Ṭūsī, Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥasan, 995-1067?
abstract: Section of a commentary on al-Mufīd's Muqniʻah, comprising Kitāb al-duyūn wa-al-kafālāt through Kitāb al-diyāt .
extent: 468 leaves : paper ; 298 x 167 (205 x 102) mm bound to 298 x 173 mm
creator: Ṭūsī, Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥasan, 995-1067?
طوسي، محمد بن الحسن، 995-1067?
subject: Mufīd, Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad, -1022—Muqniʻah.
binding_note: Full red-brown leather with gold-stamped central mandorla, pendants and fillets; brown leather doublures.
call_number: Oversize Islamic Manuscripts, New Series no. 1168q
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
